textContent: yanis guest house your best marrakesh spot
text1: Escape to a dream vacation and immerse yourself in the tranquil oasis of luxury nestled in one of the most beautiful places in Marrakesh.
revealText: Indulge in life’s simple luxuries at Yanis Guest House, where we’re dedicated to pampering you.
horiScrollTitle1: Embark on a Sensory journey at Yanis Guest House
horiScrollContent1: Upon your arrival at Yanis Guest House, prepare to be enchanted by the seamless blend of surroundings, luxurious materials, and impeccable craftsmanship.
horiScrollContent1_1: Everywhere you gaze, you’ll encounter a grandeur that beckons you to reach out and experience it: the velvety softness of fabrics, the intricate details of sculpted plaster and zellige tilework, and the refreshing coolness of marble.
horiScrollTitle2: Discover the Yanis Guest House Restaurant, where a delicate and exclusive scent creates an irresistibly delightful atmosphere.
horiScrollContent2: Our simple yet elegant menu of classic Moroccan cuisine, with a distinct Marrakesh touch, adds another dimension to your food experience.
horiScrollContent2_1: Savour local delicacies, get better acquainted with a different list of famous Moroccan dishes and end your dinner on a sweet note with a sumptuous choice of dessert.
horiScrollTitle3: Indulge in Yanis Guest House: A Plethora of Activities Await
horiScrollContent3: Explore the Untamed Beauty of Marrakech Delve into the captivating charm of Marrakech, a city shaped by its unique geology and rich history. Discover it from a fresh perspective through engaging tours filled with fun moments, anecdotes, adventures, and culinary delights.
toReturnTitle: TO RETURN TO Yanis Guest House BACK TIME AND TIME AGAIN.
toReturnContent1: Yanis Guest House thrives on tireless efforts, unwavering employee dedication, continuous self-reflection, and bold yet respectful innovations. This legacy establishment seamlessly blends tradition with modernity, remaining a legendary destination that evolves alongside the present.
toReturnContent2: Our most cherished reward lies in the loyalty of our customers, who return time and again because they feel right at home.
uniqueTitle: Discover the Unique Charms of Yanis Guest House
uniqueContent1: our hospitality is woven into every detail. From your initial visit, we commit to memory of your preferences: the perfect room temperature, your favorite coffee, and the drinks and dishes that delight your senses.
uniqueContent2: so, our attention to detail extends beyond ensuring your comfort during your stay. We also delight in surprising you, creating an experience that remains perpetually fresh and inviting.
title: the accommodations
revealTextRoom: Yanis Guest House, nestled in the vibrant city of Marrakesh, offers a delightful blend of luxury and comfort. Our elegant rooms and suites combine timeless design with simple beauty, ensuring a memorable stay. As you step into our oasis, you’ll discover an outdoor swimming pool and a lush garden. Whether for business or leisure, Yanis Guest House promises an unforgettable stay.
description1: Dive into a warm and elegant atmosphere, where the refinement of traditional moldings harmonizes with modern design. This room offers a comfortable bed for restful nights, in a carefully decorated setting. Every detail has been thought out to create a soothing atmosphere, ideal for an exceptional stay. Enjoy a comfortable bed and a welcome tea for a serene stay.
description2: A perfect balance of modernity and tradition, our double room welcomes you into a warm and refined setting. Equipped with a private bathroom featuring a walk-in shower, it is perfect for a relaxing stay. You can choose between a double bed or two separate single beds, depending on your needs.
description3: With its refined style and intimate atmosphere, this junior suite is designed for a serene stay. Featuring a king-size bed and an elegant living room, it offers a comfortable and warm space. Enjoy a welcome tea upon arrival and savor an included breakfast to start the day off right.
description4: Sumptuous and spacious, the presidential suite combines luxury and authenticity in an exceptional setting. It features two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, and a beautifully furnished Moroccan living room, ideal for sharing unique moments. Designed to offer comfort and refinement, it promises an unforgettable stay, accompanied by a welcome tea and an included breakfast.
description5: Ideal for family or friends' stays, this spacious suite can accommodate up to 6 people. It features a private living room and two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom for absolute comfort. Elegance, intimacy, and conviviality come together to create an unforgettable experience, enhanced by a welcome tea and an included breakfast.
description6: Offering a soothing view of the pool, this junior suite combines elegance and comfort. It features a king-size bed, a welcoming living area, and a bright and warm atmosphere. A welcome tea and an included breakfast complete your stay.
outroTitle: enjoy our various list of rooms and suits
outroParag: Spread across various floors of the villa, each of our rooms at Yanis Guest House offers a unique experience designed to elevate your stay. Whether you’re gazing out at the lush Gardens or the sparkling pool, or perhaps enjoying a moment of tranquility on your private balcony, our rooms combine comfort and charm. They beckon you to savor time in the most delightful way possible.
